Blog.post: 1. what are you doing now? checking all my acounts... 2. what were you doing before this? cramming for a chinese test 3. what are you thinking about now? why is "he" not online?!! arrgh! ;0) 4. what time is it? 5:22 5. what time did you sleep last night? around 2:00 6. what did you do last night? fixed my room and replied to all those who sent me text messages--> for the 1st time;0) 7. what did you last say to a friend last night? i gotta sleep na.... 8. what attracts you to the opposite sex? the brains.... 9. what makes u happy? a lotta stuff... 10. what are you wearing right now? my school uniform 11. what will you do after answering this? answer another survey... 12. what did you last ate? ->who the hell made this?? wrong grammar! haha;0) uhm, this bar of heavenly, ooh so delicious chocolate... 13. what do you want to tell someone but you dont know how to tell him/her? ->why do you make me assume??!! are you for real?? 14. when is your birthday? 8-8-88 15. when is your bf/gfs birthday? which one? haha;0) joke. 16.when did you last cry? lst night ;0( 17. why? i remembered someone... 18. why did you answer this? i dunno.. ;0) 19. when will you marry? when "he" asks me to..haha;0) 20. when did you last receive a gift? last week.. 21. when did you last drink alcoholic beverages? last saturday.. 22. who will you vote for president? havent thought of it.. 23. who was the last person you talked w/ saan? michi..here beside me.. 24. who makes you happy? him, my REAL friends, shiny happy people,GOD, my family, etc. 25. who makes you sad? the same person who makes me happy=him. 26. who has the qualities you like in a guy/girl? i can't tell..;0) 27. who is your best friend? cathie... ady... 28. who are your guy ka-barkadas? uhm, i guess the bacal boys plus some other guys... 29. who has the cutest smile youve ever seen? c *toot* haha;0) 30. who do you talk on d phone with often? no one.. 31. do you belong to a team in your school? yes. 32. if yes, what team? a lot. 33. why did you join the team? because i want to. 34. do you smoke? nah.. 35. do you drink? at times... 36. do you have someone in mind that you want to marry? nope.. 37. do you like swimming? yep. 38. do you wear eye contacts? spectacles. 39. do you text much? depends on the person.. 40. do you kiss your parents good night? yep. ;0) 41. do your crush often sends you a message in? what the?? wrong grammar ulit! ;0) 42. how about in e-mail? nah. 43. how often do you use the internet? almost everyday 44. how is your hair styled right now? tiedback in a ponytail 45. how are you feeling right now? wasted. 46. how is the weather? cloudy skies with scattered rain showers and thunder storms... 47. how will you court your loved one? i will?? 48. how did you learn about friendster? i cant remember 49. how old are you this year? 16 50. how did you like answering this? i didnt! ;0)

Meet me in outerspace We could spend the night, watch the earth come up I've grown tired of that place, wont you come with me We could start again How do you do it, make me feel like I do How do you do it, its better than I ever knew Meet me in outerspace I will hold you close, If your afraid of heights I need you to see this place, It might be the only way That I can show you how, it feels to be inside of you How do you it, make me feel like I do How do you do it, its better than I ever knew How do you do it, make me feel like I do You are stellar You are stellar How do you it, make me feel like I do How do you do it, its better than I ever knew How do you do it, make me feel like I do How do you do it, make me feel like I do, Yeah.

here's a joke... why is money called "dough"? answer: because we "knead" (need) it. corny...;0) bonus dumb question: if the dough is made into a fruit loaf, does that make it a currants-y (currency)? corny tlga..;0)

my siensi (teacher in chinese class) asked us what we would want to be when we grow up... my classmate chi-an answered: " lao shr, wo chhang tah i hou si wang chuo gong1" (teacher, when i grow up, i want to ba a janitor.)--> this gave me a funny thought ;0) >> so that's why he studies trigonometry: so that he would know how to calculate efficiently the area of the floor he'll be working with... >>and chemistry: so that he'll know just the right formula for the floor wax needed in his line of work... sicko!! ;0) chi-an, i do hope that you'll someday top the international school for janitorial services.....

today is the "monthsary" of my friendship with michi. She thought of the idea of celebrating our friendship when i went with her to visit her former school last june 23. ;0) ain't she sweet? ;0) wla lng..share ko lng...

today, i finally feeel like i'm shredding off that princess costume... i don't understand why people just love making stories about me... in school, i feel like i'm an actress with all those lights focused on me...i just hate the attention i get from everyone..it's like they know every single move i make...every little thing i do. they expect me to be someone i'm not...and just because i'm not to change my being, that doesn't give them the right to judge me. there's a time to breakdown and a time to build up.... so to all those people who's been backstabbing me, here's what i got to say: GET A LIFE! and pls stay away from mine cz nothing you say can ever make me falter in what i believe in...and if you think you're way better than me, well, just keep telling yourself that! ;0)

and now for the world's stupidest court cases: a local lawyer tried to convince the court that it wasn't his client but his client's pet rooster who was guilty of owning illegal objects in the rooster's cage so the lawyer argued that they were actually the rooster's property and the rooster should be punished...;0) uhm, yeah, and the dog ate our homework...;0)

i was struck when somebody approached me today and asked -- " why are you always so busy?" it made me think and i ended up with a conclusion that being busy for me is like a defense mechanism..im busy not because i should be but because i choose to be..it somehow helps me forget what my real problems are..having to worry about deadlines, things to do, etc. makes me feel better because i know that at least these problems, i believe, i can easily surpass... later in the day, i came to realize a lot of things like... #1 sometimes i get sick of that "me first" attitude... and having to spend 8 hrs in school surrounded by people who believe that they should always be first, can really get you insane.. its tough to try to get along with people who like you but just love hating you whenever you achieve something they know they cant. i just want to be in a world where nobody will judge me... #2 the main problem of our society is apathy towards poverty and discrimination.. #3 strange is really different from weird--> thanks to LL...haha;0) #4 how do you know if someone is biologically dumb or is just playing dumb?!? #5 the question -- "what's new" is used everyday....
Should you find yourself a victim of other people's bitterness, ignorance, smallness, or insecurities; remember things could be worst...you could be one of them.
